text: 13.34: Wkp 19.18; Zo 15.12; 15.17; 1 Pi 1.22; 1 Zo 2.7-8; 3.23; 4.21; 2 Zo 1.5Gu ntigem tɨvir ŋkaar nde ndɨɨv, khaŋ nde nzuai, nde bevbevira, nde guigira wari won ndavir warir nɨɨŋri. Gu guigira won ndavar nde nɨɨŋgi. Nde vhɨra mba tɨvara, nde bevbevira, nde guigira wari won ndavir warir nɨɨŋri.
